body_html: I've started testing an internal change to convert MklCpuAllocator to a VisitableAllocator. I don't foresee any problem with making this change, but it's possible there's a difficulty somewhere. I'm less confident that DefaultCPUAllocator can be changed that way, since it may need to be a very simple type for use in some contexts, e.g. mobile devices. @eladweiss : would your needs be satisfied by changing just MklCpuAllocator?
